website_summaries.verdict: A military-grade adhesive screen protector with self-healing material that covers the contours of the face.
pros: Made from clear, scratch-proof, military-grade material that's laser-cut to fit 44-millimeter Apple Watch 4
Thin, self-healing shield covers the entire screen, following contours
Can be easily peeled off if you must remove
cons: Does not protect watch's edges and sides

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend for the series 4
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting application but it was easy enough with the instructions. It is nice, thin, and flexible so can’t really notice it’s on. I can 100% see this protecting my device from scratches. I had the 3rd series and it got so scratched I wanted to try this out to protect my 4. It fits perfectly. I recommend it. I was very iffy because it had no reviews but it looked and sounded more official then the other screen protectors claiming the 3 and 4 are the same size and using old products. I can see this is made for the series 4 edge to edge
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Better than any 'Glass': trick is to hold it down with both hands for 10 min!
customer_reviews.text: Day 1: so far so good - take a look at the pictures - no bubbles, no scratches, edged attached perfectly and you can't really tell that there's a film protecting the screen. THE TRICK IS: after you removed all moisture and have aligned the film properly, put the watch (remove the band first) inside one palm right in the middle and cover with other palm and press and hold it down for at least 10 min. it is shown on the instructional video but they didn't emphasize on the importance of this past stage - it will allow all the edge glue perfectly around the curved edges of the screen. hope you find it helpful. good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Keleb the Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my super case installation was ok. Single bubble didn’t disappear, feels like nothing is on the screen. Installed almost a month now and not disappointed will be purchasing more. When installing make sure the sticky part is on the watch face. Watch the video and follow instructions
customer_reviews.author: Krs t reid

customer_reviews.title: Great for series 4 !!
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with this protector. I would strongly encourage watching the instruction video (link provided in box) prior to trying to do this on your own. I can barely tell it’s on the screen. The cool thing is they somehow developed a way that the screen adheres to the natural curve of the watch (I have the series 4). Def worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: TeeM

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Fits series 4 nicely, a few air bubbles but that’s my mistake make sure you put a blow dryer on low warm follow direction easy install.. protects screen from scratches well.. good product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Protection for Lifetime Indeed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just upgraded my Apple Watch to Series 5 44mm and had to get a screen protector to make sure that my screen is protected. I am pretty careful when it comes to gadget and they usually last me for years, but accidents happen. Especially that this one is on my wrist and you sometimes you just bump it everywhere. The box came with the instructions on how to apply the protector and all the materials needed. I went to watch the video just to make sure that I did it right. I’m probably getting this again if I get another watch series.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Raglow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - I actually installed it correctly!
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is awesome! I am a complete klutz and I was able to install it just like they showed on the video. It took only 10 minutes total with 2 hours in between to dry. You can feel the edge just a little but I can barely see it on the screen. I am anxious to see how long it lasts but at this price point I will probably replace it every 6 months regardless. It is very important to watch the video and follow it exactly. It really clarified the whole installation. I am very glad to have a screen protector on my shiny new Watch. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: R DeVillers

customer_reviews.title: Shield?
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 2 weeks. Extremely disappointed. Yes I understand it is meant to protect the screen on your watch. However the shield itself scratches very easily. I should have known by the price. I will be shopping for something better. The one major issue I did forget to mention. 6 Shields??? only two in the box. A real rip off!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Already did it’s job and saved my watch
customer_reviews.text: I put this screen protector on my Apple Watch Series 4 shortly after it arrived. A few days later, I was shoveling rock for a landscaping project and had forgotten to take my watch off. I was horrified my the huge scratch on the face of the screen protector. But, the screen protector did its job and protected the actual screen from damage. Installation is a little tricky, but if you follow the directions and watch the installation video, it’s not too bad...just requires a little patience. Luckily these come as a 2 pack, so once I removed the scratched one, I installed the other one.
customer_reviews.author: Neil G. Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: These leak white streaks on your screen
customer_reviews.text: I put it on and I was like there’s these white streaks so I’m thinking I messed up. I used the second one and I got them again. I followed all instructions and seriously the look is horrible. I really don’t think it’ll protect my new watch. Furthermore, the screen protectors were hard to peel off and not leave fingerprints. I had to tread ultra carefully. I very much dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: What a Joke
customer_reviews.text: This is the dumbest attempt at screen protection I've ever seen. The film for the 44mm watch is WAY TOO BIG for the 44mm watch... It literally cascades off of the face of the watch in every direction. It's comical that Armor Suit actually went to production with this product. What a joke. I have returned the product and ordered a screen protector from IQ. Hopefully they put a little more effort into R&D.
customer_reviews.author: Coach D

customer_reviews.title: no peeling!
customer_reviews.text: There is no peeling with these screen protectors at all whatsoever! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tillman Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Can’t tell it’s on the watch.
customer_reviews.text: Having bought a glass screen protector for my watch which didn’t sit well on the glass I decided to use this skin protector. It looks great and can’t even tell it’s on the watch. It’s not easy to apply. Specially getting the edges to stick but with some patience it goes on nicely and you really can’t tell it’s on there. I did have to wait a day to install the additional TPU protector I have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I reserve the right to come back and lower this rating... however, I was pleasantly surprised by how easily this installed and how clear it appears! I’m not sure I can even tell it’s on my watch right now. And I’m pretty picky when it comes to these $$$ Apple products! :) I will give it a few weeks. Hopefully it protects with some multiple above and beyond the glass the Apple Series 4 Watch currently has because my first watch cracked in about 2 weeks (though I didn’t have a screen cover on watch #1). Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: MMA

customer_reviews.title: Patients
customer_reviews.text: It just takes patients, I’d recommend using gloves rather then barehanded. If u can use a blow dryer, low plus low heat, keep wipe down the edges repeatedly. This product was 85% cheaper then white dome. Soon as I used this one I canceled the white dome. Also I’d like to admit, I’ve never been able to put a screen protector on any of my phones, I’m far from a professional so if I can do it anyone can. Damm these dudes should endorse me, good luck & give it a shot
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mayor

customer_reviews.title: Great product with full coverage and durability
customer_reviews.text: I’m really satisfied with ArmorSuit products, I have purchased their screen protectors in the past for all my Apple Watches and they have been a perfect and clear fit and they are also very long lasting. I recently bought one for the series 4 Apple Watch and it’s a perfect fit with full screen coverage (the screen protector covers the entire face of the Watch) other screen protectors only cover the screen portion of the front and not the whole face of the Apple Watch, but ArmorSuit covers the entire face of the Apple Watch from edge to edge so I’m very satisfied with their product and no other screen protector offers the full coverage that ArmorSuit has.
customer_reviews.author: emil a.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and tough!
customer_reviews.text: If you need an easy-to-install and durable Apple Watch screen protector, this is your product. At first I thought that I might not be able to achieve a professional "bubble-less" installation, but with the included 30-second instructional video I had the screen protector on my Apple Watch in less than one minute. It's been on for a month, taking abuse without a scratch. Very durable. I really do not think that there is a visual difference between having this protective screen on and without one -- it's that clear. No glare either. I'm fairly picky so if I had any problem, you'd be reading about it here. No issues whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable screen protector. The best part is they include 6 of them!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen protector, especially for it's price and the fact they give you 6. The only issues i've had are that it's a little more difficult to install then the average screen protector for something like a phone, but as long as you follow the instructions it comes out great. I installed it on two separate occasions and had no air bubbles. Another issue I had was that if I put a case on the watch, it causes the protector to shift therefore causing some bubbles on the side. Overall, I think this is a great purchase especially if you don't put cases on your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Will do in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought I had found the perfect screen protectors. I installed two screen protectors on a 40mm & 44mm Apple Watch. I watched the installation video 10 times before installing this product to make it worked perfectly. The screen protector did fine for about a month & then started peeling. Unfortunately, they do not repair themselves when they get scratched as claimed. In the meantime, I've installed these 4 times and they seem to last for about a month each time. They either peel, remain bubbled or scratch. I reached out to the seller for further advise, but pretty much got the same reply as in their videos. Simply an OK product & nothing more
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It Is Designed To Do... if you do it right
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using AmorSuit on both Apple Watch 2 and 4 for a while, they perform as expected. Installation is rather easy, but make sure to leave enough time as it does require a “curing” time. The screen protector is soft, clear pliable latex-like sheet that goes over the wet surface sprayed by the provided solution. I noticed that when I rush the process, the result was not desirable. Once the protector is set, then I left it alone to cure for about an hour then folded the edges into place. Massaging the edges gently with light to moderate pressure for a few minutes seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: BOSU

customer_reviews.title: Great when you how to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is my fav screen protector for curved glass cellphones and watches. But there is a trick to it. First make sure you use enough liquid to slide it without resistance into place. Let it set for about two minutes and don’t do anything to the edges yet. Then take the squeegee and get the bubbles out. Carefully blot excess liquid with paper towel. Let it set for five minutes. Then spray just a little around the edges not too much. Then take a blow dryer and slightly heat up the sides. Carefully push down and your done. Mine lasts at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eppes

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other screen protector out there
customer_reviews.text: The last screen protector I bought would easily scratch, peel off, etc. NOT THIS ONE by ArmorSuit. Armorsuit's screen protector is easy to install (if you follow the video instructions), doesn't peel and protects my 44mm Apple Watch 4. It covers the bevels without peeling off the edges. FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS! Apply for overnight. It comes with two shields, in case for some reason it gets damaged, which I doubt since I accidentally scraped my watch against something, and it absorbed the scrape, bubbled a little, then the next day, the bubble disappeared. You can not find a better watch screen protector than this. Yes, I'm a verified customer and NOT a fake review.
customer_reviews.author: rjz

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Over Hyped but Do Prevent Scratches
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be just okay. I used 2 of them and each only lasted about 2 weeks before they started coming off on a corner got lint stuck to them and needed replaced. Somewhat scratch resistant but would scuff easily with paint if rubbed on a door frame when going through. I also found the sizing to seem a hair to small For the 44mm. All of this being said for the time used the face of my watch got no scratches. So while i think the scrcen protectors dont live up to the hype l probably got what i paid for.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job protecting your screen without being noticable. You can only tell it's on if you're really scrutinizing it. The self healing does work. I've "scratched" it twice now and the mark slowly fades away after a few days or weeks if it's large. Only complaint would be there's two in the box and one of mine came creased and unusable. Considering many screen protectors only give you one to begin with it's not too bad a problem, so long as you install the first one correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not durable or reliable
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend these, they are not durable. I have this screen cover on my Apple Watch series 5. After 2 failed attempts at installing this I finally got a solid application on my third attempt. I was really happy with the look and feel. Yet on day 2 it started to peel up on the edges. I’m extremely careful with my watch and these just won’t last long term, no way. Once even the smallest edge comes up dirt can find a way in and it’s game over. I’m not gonna spend a lot of time reinstalling these so after my third failed attempt I’m done.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Duke

customer_reviews.title: Watch YouTube install video and read directions before you attempt install!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t read directions and watch the YouTube video of how to install this you will probably do it wrong and not be satisfied. I read and watch the video and the install went great. No bubbles and peeling up of corners or edges. Be patient and be sure to install in a clean place with clean hands. Take your time to repeatedly smooth down corners and edges. Set it down and come back in a few hours and smooth again. I haven’t had anything smash against the face yet so I don’t have any feed back of how that will hold up yet...
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap protection with replacements.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Still on the first one and it has some dings that would of definitely have damaged my newest gen iwatch. All the protectors come on one sheet, so you will need to find a secure spot to keep them where they won’t get accidentally peeled off. Also, hold the protector side firmly I’m your palm for five minutes after you have it centered. This is the best way to get it down around edges. Then let sit overnight. Worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy The Tooth

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that appears exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in the hopes of covering some superficial scratches to my Apple Watch and to prevent any such scratches in the future. My initial apprehension was that, in the past, these types of products are difficult to install and always leave air bubbles or don't fit quite right; or worse, the product is not transparent so you can tell there's a protective film. This product, however, is easy to install, leaves no trace of bubbles, and is perfectly transparent. Best of all, it managed to cover the superficial scratches and seems pretty hardy to me. I would definitely recommend this to anyone wearing an Apple Watch...they're so easily scratched and damaged it is well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dain Zylstra

customer_reviews.title: Edges keep lifting after numerous tries
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a Apple Watch Series 6 and wanted to add screen protection from scuffs and scratches and although the packaging is very good and came with squeegee, spray, microfiber cloth and several screen protectors, I thought well it’s comes with all these amazing stuff and extra protectors! But the edges keep lifting after a few hours and I tried all the extras it came with, and it all had the same issue. I followed their video instructions carefully and still no luck.
customer_reviews.author: David J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Fit & Barely Notice It
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend ! Easy to apply by following the instructions and be patient with it. The included spray solution is very helpful to adjust the protector to the right spot. With a blow dryer makes the process easier. It comes with 2 screen protectors that I applied the second one on Series 2 and it perfectly fit as well!
customer_reviews.author: Neko Yee

customer_reviews.title: Fair price and great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase. Great price for 6 pack of screen shields. I needed to watch the installation video to understand correct how to apply the shield (instructions on how to go to video included - easy to follow). Does not effect sensitivity of screen and installs nice and flat. No bubbles! Can’t even notice it’s on when you look at my watch. Also it wraps edges of screen real nice and doesn’t lift up at corners like other brand I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Peeled off like a sticker after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't quite sure how durable this flexible covering might be when I opened up the package. I didn't realize it wasn't more solid of a covering. But after fumbling with installing it on the watch which was a test of patience, I thought it was nice because it was nearly imperceptible on the watch. There's a plasticy feel to it when it's on, which makes the tactile functions like swiping different, but that wasn't too bad. But one day, I was reaching into a cabinet to get something and the film just peeled back and rolled up on the watch. I have yet to put the second one on because I'm afraid it will just do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Boehm

customer_reviews.title: I have never left one star on anything and this deserves less than that.
customer_reviews.text: I cant give the scratch resistance and touch screen a fair review because honestly I didn’t get to make it that far. this is by far the hardest and I mean the most difficult screen protector I have ever tried to put on any of my electronics. I would say I’m rather good at getting most screens on electronics in fact I end up doing it for family but that was not the case. I followed directions exactly and just could not get it on correctly. I mean I wasted the entire box trying to get it right and never could. These are just not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDI

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a cover that surrounded my watch when I first purchased it but it got in the way of several functions including changing out the watch bands. I looked for something new and found Armorsuit! I love this product. It covers my devices screen nicely including the rounded edges of my 44mm version well and you can hardly see it unless looking very closely! Watch the video for installation to make sure it is done right! There is dry time involved for it to stay exactly where you want it. I will be buying more for other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Watson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This film is rigid square. That's why it creases up at the edges due to curved nature of the watch surface. It looks OK for few days and start to bubble up from edges. I followed the instructions from the video 100%. That's not enough because the product is inherently faulty in material and design.
customer_reviews.author: Tomy

customer_reviews.title: Much better choice than Zagg for the watch4
customer_reviews.text: I had no problem installing and am enjoying the peace of mind. I had a Zagg glass curve elite but once upon installation and once upon a side hit, I cracked the glass. It served its purpose but I feel it is too delicate as I use my hands actively in the workplace and bumping and hitting will occur often. I can't keep going thru "free" replacements that cost $10 for shipping or replacement at a local kiosk, so now I have 5 backups thanks to the armor suit that comes with 6 protectors. I think these are better suited as they will keep scratches from happening without cracking like glass. Time will tell but I'm happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Moretz

customer_reviews.title: Too complicated to install
customer_reviews.text: This was literally the most difficult screen protector I have ever tried to install. I got too frustrated that I just threw it away, not worth my time to even return it. I have bought many screen protectors for my iPhones and they just required pulling the adhesive off and placing it on the screen. This required spraying liquid, applying the screen, scraping out the bubbles and letting it dry. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great value, durable so far
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely surprised that this is holding up ok. Install was a little odd with having to let any liquid dry before adhering the edges but I haven't had a single corner peel up on me in a couple weeks. Touch response seems fine and you can barely see that there's anything on the screen unless you're looking. There is a minimal amount of orange peel if you look in the right light but again, you have to look for it. Not to mention is basically par for the this type of material.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kintz

customer_reviews.title: Saved face more than once!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these. I haven’t used up the first pack of 2, they do what they are for., protect the screen. I use my hands at work and I would have destroyed the face on my Apple 4 watch, these watch protectors have saved me so much grief. I have recommended these to all my coworkers. Take your time with the install, follow the instructions and watch the video. The rollover of the edges can be s little tricky, just take your time and they will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Eliott

customer_reviews.title: shield not big enough for 44mm watch screen
customer_reviews.text: If used with a protective case for the 44mm apple watch any slight movement of the case around the face will make the edges of the shield come up! Have put numerous shields ( bought four boxes) on the watch and it continues to occur, shield doesn’t cover enough of the sides and corners. Should be made to fit down to the watch screen edge all the way around so case will not catch edge of shield! Too small.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Cook

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you want to avoid a potential $300 plus trip to the Apple Store for repairs.
customer_reviews.text: You spent at least $350 on you series 3, or series 4 Apple Watch. Do yourself a favor and spend under $10 to keep that beautiful screen scratch and crack free. I banged my watch a few times and forgot I had one of these guys on it. No scratches or cracks to date. Full functionality as far as the touch screen goes and the install was pretty easy. You may need to install your case with care as the edges will want to raise up. Worth every penny and doesn't take away from the aesthetics too greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Great product, cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I had read a recommendation for this product on a page for a case and honestly i'm glad I did. This screen protector was super easy to install, instructions were easy to follow, and all items needed where included. Installed in minutes and after following the instructions and letting it dry for a while it was ready to pop into the case I was using it with. It has been great so far, i've hit the watch into a few things already by accident and don't see any scratches it has done exactly what is claims to do. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Protective Film Needs Hair Dryer...
customer_reviews.text: I have since recanted my review on this product. I read up on some other posts which suggested using a hair dryer in the application process. This worked very well and what I needed in order to get the edges to form to the iwatch. This information should be shared by the company in their instruction videos. I have had it on my watch for a few days. It's starting to come off on one of the edges...it also got easily marked with a scuff that I had to buff out. Although the product can be applied, I don't believe it's as protective and fool proof as others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Solid Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Armorsuit screen protector products because they're great quality at good prices. This Applewatch screen protector is no exception. I got it as a gift and installed it myself which was easy since it was really intuitive and easy to place. If it's placed a bit off then you can just peel it back and do it again, it has plenty of solution for errors.
customer_reviews.author: Kevpa

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, but edges look bad and delivery took a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on 01-01-20 and it finally got to me on 01-19-20. I've used this product in the past and it provides good protection from daily bumps and abrasion - I work a lot in outdoor environments. Regardless of how carefully I install it there soon comes a time when the edges don't stick, peel back from the curved edges of the watch and it really detracts from the appearance of the watch face.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent for the price. Didn’t really care for the spray on installation process. The corners are hard to keep down so I then my bumper on to help. I feel like my screen is a tad bit blurry. To most people it probably wouldn’t matter but once I notice something it sticks with me. I’ll definitely keep it on for now but I’d like a more glass textured protector this one feels more like rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: ArmorSuit Failed this one.
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping this was a one time issue, as I have used this brand before on my other Apple products. This screen protector is no good though. It seemed as if someone had lifted the screen protector off the sheet it comes on, this contaminated the back and caused there to be dust and small white specks on my screen. Screen prep was done as normal and instructions followed, both screen protectors looked the same and looked hazy when done. Not a happy customer. I attempted to add a photo for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Watch protector protects!
customer_reviews.text: If you spray too much on the protector, it’s difficult to place and longer to adhere. The blow dryer did help speed up the process. When I first put it on and after it dried, it looked great, you couldn’t tell it was on. however a few days later, when I hit the corner of my watch, the protector lifted. Since then the same corner lifts a tiny bit off the watch every now and then. A temporary fix is to Press on it for a few seconds or so and it adheres to the watch again. I like that the protector heals itself.
customer_reviews.author: honeyrose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best screen protector I have found so far. Not to mention the best value as well. We all know that as soon something gets labeled “Apple”, the price climbs exponentially. Not the case here. The screens are easy to apply and the kit includes more then enough of everything you need. After around 3-4 months the edges may start to lift, and then it’s time to replace the protector. But as stated before, it’s easy enough! The most important thing though, they don’t change the look of feel of your precious Apple Watch! They are virtually impossible to see once applied and retain the feel of the original screen.
customer_reviews.author: 1poorvw

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect I bought these back in Auguest now June only had to replace once due the fact I am nurse working w Covid all the washing I think finally killed the stickyness, but seriously if you ain’t surgical scrubbing thousand times a shift w your iwatch on w this screen protector its held up thru normal nursing shift, barn work, & barrel racing. Not a scratch on my iWatch.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product to protect, however, you will not get a clear screen
customer_reviews.text: I have this for about a week and a half now. Application was easy, and things went smoothly. I noticed a few weird bubbles, those went away within a few minutes. I also noticed that the screen is no longer crystal clear, and that the film that is the protector causes light to refract a certain way, so the screen is no longer clear (gives it a lower resolution blurry look) It doesn't bother me, as I assume this is just a result of the protector being plastic. However, if this does bother you, I would consider looking for another brand that has clearer screen protector
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Le

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for 2 days, and then it starts to lift. Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: They are great... for about 2 days. When you apply this correctly, you can’t see it and it doesn’t negatively effect the touchscreen. However, within just a few days, the corners and sides start to lift. The first time it happened, I blamed myself...maybe I rubbed it on the furniture or something that may cause it to start lifting. Luckily, it comes with 6 covers. Well, it wasn’t me.. or anything that I did. The product is just crappy and doesn’t adhere to the curved sides of the Apple Watch. I’ve now applied 4 of the 6 in just a couple of weeks and plan to return the kit. Attached photo is how it looked after just 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Verhagen

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector. Just be patient with the install
customer_reviews.text: Nice coverage and works better than the cases I’ve tried. The install can be a bit tricky if you’re not patient. This isn’t a quick slap on and go protector, so make sure you set aside 15-20 minutes to do it properly. It’s not noticeable once it’s installed and I haven’t had any issues with the touchscreen. I will update my review if there’s any problems, but overall I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SDK

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Con: It very slightly takes away from the sleek feel of the naked glass. Pro: EVERYTHING ELSE! After I got used to the new feel, I forget it is there. And I am very fortunate to say that I never dropped my watch UNTIL AFTER I installed the protective film. Speaking of, installation was super easy and looks great on the watch (just be sure to follow the instructions closely! Using a hair dryer is vital!)
customer_reviews.author: Esteban R Barrera

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: Coolest screen protector I’ve ever used. It’s amazing and fits well (not perfect). Application was pretty annoying but the end result is worth the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!! Read updated review
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it and I’m more than impressed. It’s just invisible and you can’t even tell the screen protector is on. Highly recommended. Update: after using it for a month or so, I’ve downgraded the rating. The protector itself is good but the edges come off very easily. I’ve replaced 3 within a month and won’t be getting this again.
customer_reviews.author: Harymode

customer_reviews.title: Corners don't stay down, also not case friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Watched their installation video a couple of times to ensure I was following their exact steps, still one corner refused to stay down and in nearly no time collected dust and dirt rendering it completely unable to stick. Also put a case on the watch after a couple of days to protect the corners, and in a matter of hours another corner was rubbed up and filthy. It seems a value that you get two in the box, but since they are only nice looking for a day or so they aren't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Loo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a good product. You get several in a package. Take your time and apply correctly. It protects my watch very well and I hardly notice it’s there. I’m very rough on my watch as I live in a farm. I tried the glass ones from other companies but they rarely last over a week. I get several months out of each of these and there are several in a package. I don’t mean that as a bad thing, like I said I’m very rough on my watch. I don’t take it off when I’m working on something. I would recommend this product. My wife has used them also and hers lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely happy with the purchase. The screen protector is easy to apply and doesn't leave finger prints on it (even the side that comes into contact with the screen, as long as it is wet and your finger is wet with the liquid). It doesn't leave any bubbles when I install it. In short, super easy to install and super durable. Absolutely value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Low

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: I did not find these screen protectors easy to work with. Maybe it was just me but I’ve been using screen protectors for years and I had similar protectors on my old Apple Watch Series 2 and for some reason I could not get these to stick and stay. I blew through both of the protectors in the pack and ultimately just left my Apple Watch screen unprotected, disappointing. I can see why these would be durable but since I cannot rate it based on how durable it is, I am rating it on the possibly of being durable, while rating it poorly due to the fact I couldn’t even get them on my device.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Simone

customer_reviews.title: Over a year and still amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have come back over a year later to write this review. I put this on my watch literally a year ago and it looks like it was just installed. I've never had a protector last this long. Several times I've had to get a magnifying glass to make sure it's still there and YES! I don't know if I got lucky or this product is just this good. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My Honest Opinion
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't to fond of this item. After following the instructions I couldn't get passed the putting the screen on. While trying to align the screen protector it kept sliding around to much and wouldn't stay aligned. The edges of the screen protector would not stay flush with the actual watch. I am only rating this on installation. I didn't get a chance to see if the touch sensitivity was good or not and how well the scratch resistant was.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Value And Easy Application
customer_reviews.text: This product fits well and was easy to install. It serves its purpose and adheres well without too much obstruction to view and it was definitely the cheapest option amongst the difference choices.
customer_reviews.author: Chien Sean Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Once installed you can't tell it's even on there. The key thing is to follow the instructions closely. The most challenging part is the corners, which if you let the watch sit for ten minutes, then press each corner into your palm, they'll stay down. Be sure to check the corners every ten minutes or so afterwards to ensure they haven't risen up. After about 2 hours, all should be good. That's how I did it anyway, and it's worked like a charm! Definitely worth the price, plus you get 6 with lifetime replacements! So until Apple changes the screen size (again), you have quite a long while to use these screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the glass protectors!
customer_reviews.text: Since buying my apple watch I have used the glass screen protector for it but those keep breaking constantly. A replacement is $10 at our local Zag so it got pricey replacing them every week so I decided to give these a try and I kick myself for not doing it earlier! The touch screen works so much better than with the glass protector and the install looks better too!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Armorsuit never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: I could not afford the apple watch with the more durable glass. I have used armor suit on my phones and have always been happy. I am not disappointed with this screen protector for the apple watch. I made a mistake and ordered the larger size, but, it was no problem to cut it down and it works as I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Lyfeizgudd

customer_reviews.title: Totally Recommend this Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I have a Series 4 Apple Watch. The pricing is just right for these screen protectors. The installation is fairly simple. Be sure to watch the installation video. It helps a lot. If there are air bubbles when you install it, they will disappear in a day or so. It does a great job protecting my Apple Watch from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit my watch it’s basically a thing piece of plastic wrap. Doesn’t hug the sides and if you have a bump case when you put the case on the film pulls up. No refunds do to flammable materials or gases... are they referring to the soapy water in a tube they supply. So not worth it! Completely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: After trying several others this one really works!
customer_reviews.text: After falling for the fake reviews on several other products, I am pleased to find this one that really works! It covers the full face including the curved edges (others did not). I have scuffed it several times (better than scuffing the actual watch face), and the scuffs clean off very easily with soap and water. (The others I have tried would not clean up, so you have to live with the scuff or constantly replace them). Very clear to the point that I cannot tell that my watch has a cover. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Lad

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection and Awesome Value
customer_reviews.text: I've tried the bigger name brands (Zagg, etc.) and they're good, too. This ArmorSuit protector is not only easy to install, and just as good if not better than the other guys but is also an awesome value! All protectors eventually wear out or peel off- especially when on an Apple Watch with the curved screen edges. This is my second time purchasing this product because the first one was so good that when it came time to replace it, I wanted the same thing again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leapman

customer_reviews.title: Good for a week or two but starts to come off
customer_reviews.text: The install went fine. After the install everything works as expected. After a few weeks the edges or corners starts to peel. Once that happens over a few more weeks more starts to peel off. If you are ok with replacing this every 2 or 3 months that is fine but it doesn't stick on enough to last.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Dude

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: As stated by the instructions you will need to let the corners fully dry which can be several hours to overnight before it can adhere to the corners. I sped up the process by using a hair dryer blowing directly down on the screen protector instead of at an angle so no dust particles would get stuck under it.
customer_reviews.author: StevO

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bump anything
customer_reviews.text: Their easy to put on and I’ve had no issues with the touch screen. The only issue I have is that it seems they don’t last long. For whatever reason I look down at the watch and see a edge start peel up or a bubble forming. I’ll continue to buy and reinstall until I find or hear of something that works better. They are fairly inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R Morse

customer_reviews.title: Saved my screen a few times already!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this for about a month on my Apple watch S4 44mm. I have bumped my watch on brick walls, railings, and more that would have scratched my screen. This protector saved it every time. It has had a few scuffs from contact with those objects but with a little water and my fingernail it scraped right off leaving no noticable marks behind. It comes with two screen protectors which is great because my first one didn't adhere very well and came off in about a week. Since then I was more careful installing the second and I no longer wear my watch in the shower. No issues since.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Impossible to Install Correctly
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how well the screen protector works since it is nearly impossible to install. You have to spray your fingers and the screen protector with a liquid which turns it into a sticky, slimy film that slides all over the screen and won't stay in place. Even after 20 minutes the protector still slides all over the screen while the edges dry out and fail to adhere to the sides of the screen. Horrible installation! This is the first and last time I will ever use ArmorSuit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Henry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Make sure to get fingers and protector soaked and it will be simple. Let it dry after getting it in place and finish up. Can’t tell it’s on. Waaay better than Zagg and cheaper too.
customer_reviews.author: AimBri

customer_reviews.title: Good screen protector for light scratches
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy, follow the instructions and you should be fine. Do not spray too much of the applicator, a light mist should be enough. Also, spray a mist of the applicator when you use the rubber squeegee. If you use a bumper for your watch, be careful installing the bumper as it will pull off the screen protector. Do not install the bumper after you install the screen protector, wait a few hours or use a hair dryer
customer_reviews.author: Beastmode206

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely Loved this screen protector! it protects my apple watch series 4 very nicely without cheap-ening the look of it, if applied correctly, you can barely tell its even there. I will most definitely purchase this again, and recommend it. The only downside is that its a little messy to put on and you have to apply heat for the curved edges to stick, it comes in a box with 6 of them! so if you mess one application up you have 5 more chances! but once its applied its so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: juana torres

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at YouTube videos for Apple Watch instructional videos and I came across this product review from YouTuber. I decided to try it out an I can honestly say this is a great screen protector. Putting the screen on is a bit of a pain, but the screen protector is barely noticeable when put on. Overall a great product. Note this does not feel exactly like the glass screen on the watch but for it being hardly noticeable I’d say it’s worth it. Also it covers the whole screen. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased this sooner. After getting a small scratch on my new Apple Watch, I decided to see what I could put on it to protect it. I did a lot of research and decided to go with this protector. The item quickly arrived with Prime shipping and the instructions on how to apply the protector was very straight forward. It's been a few months and this protector is still doing its job. I would highly recommend this if you are in the market for a quality protector for your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J.

customer_reviews.title: A pain to install
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this screen protector is a pain to install....It took me 4 tries to get it right and almost run out of the provided liquid. No matter how careful I was some dust or particle ended up trapped underneath it. Once installed it works great, but the process to get there is a real pain. It fits the screen properly but it will come off at the corners. I use it with a bumper protector which keeps sits on top of the corners so it works well.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have had every Apple watch since inception. I have ordered so many screen protectors. This is by far the worst Apple Watch screen protector I have ever had. The are amazing hard to install and refuse to stay on 100% after a few days. Forget about putting on a bunker unless you want to do this all over again. 6 hours of my life I will never get back. The reason I don’t reason a lot of items on amazon is they threaten to cancel your account to the amount of returns you do even though you pay a premium to do so. I will eat this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this protector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protector for my Apple watch series 4 and have very high praise because it has saved my screen multiple times. The protectors usually last around 3 months of hard use(like a college student) if you don't have a protector case on the Apple watch because sometimes you'll swipe the screen on things and it will peel up a little bit(but can be pressed down without a problem). But now I have a protector case on mine and I will see how long it lasts(probably way longer than 3 months)! Easy to install! so definitely 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service edges peel sometimes
customer_reviews.text: I have bought multiple screen protectors from armor suit and have had excellent customer service with them my only issue is when it comes to Apple Watch screen protectors the edges seem to come up quite often, they are easily pushed back down but it is still quite a pain probably going to order a few more once this one gets bad
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Protector
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I was hesitant because many reviews for all Apple Watch series 4 protector screens say that most brand's protectors don't fit exactly. However, this one does fit perfect. I knocked off a star for accessibility when trying to install it on the watch. There is no reason I would have to watch a youtube video from their website to put it on. Simple directions in the box could have worked fine. They already include enough papers inside the box anyways.
customer_reviews.author: T S.

customer_reviews.title: Protects the screen well along with a perimeter case--while maintaining touch
customer_reviews.text: I knew my watch would take a beating if I didn't protect it. I tried several approaches to give protection while maintaining as much of the simple elegance of Apples design. The clear full coverage cases met my aesthetic criteria, but retained condensation-- which, along with the thickness of the cases, interfered with the touch interface as well as using ApplePay through the watch. This product, the ArmorSuit MilitaryShield Screen Protector, along with a clear case that protects the asides of the watch and is open on the face. Does the job well. In addition the screen protector is very easy to apply with good instructions. I also feel the 6 pack is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Stays put
customer_reviews.text: I have had other products but this one is my favorite. It goes on wet which is a little harder than average but the finished product is much better. I would scuff my watch and the other screen protectors would peel up and leave bubbles. This one goes down and stays down when bumped.
customer_reviews.author: A. Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector for Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen protector. Definitely deserves 5 stars. If you pay attention and are careful, the install goes really well. It looks great on the watch face and you can hardly even tell it's there. It fits well with the case I got for my watch also. Unlike other screen protectors I've tried, this product does NOT effect the touch response of the watch. The screen protector does really great protecting the face also. I got a ding in the screen protector and thought it would be there forever, but after a while, it "self healed" and looked bran new again. I'll definitely be buying this again if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Durability. Watch for the Amount You Pay For.
customer_reviews.text: For a screen protector I guess it prevents minor scratches happening to your actual device. The film itself scratches incredibly easy and so much as rubbing against a wall will leave a permanent paint mark on the film, forcing you to replace it. This is an issue by itself seeing you can use one of the extra films in your pack. However, even though I paid for 6 I only received 2 screen protectors that barely lasted a month together.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Previdi

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have bought these, they are great as I am one who constantly hits the face of the watch against everything. They last about 6 months when used in the ocean, water, working out, and during construction projects. Very durable, easy to put on and take off. Once on, stays on in all conditions. Will continue to purchase these as needed, great product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ostroff

customer_reviews.title: Too big for 44mm
customer_reviews.text: I tried my hardest to get this install right but no matter which direction there was some part that would continue to come up. i'm sorry i spent the money on this product
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch screen protector! I have purchased a few others in the past, but this one is the best! It dries practically invisible. For the application, I looked up the instructions online and followed along with them. They are very detailed and the application is very easy. Once you finish, you let it dry overnight, and that’s it. Perfect application. No air bubbles, and great protection. I am definitely a customer for life with this product!
customer_reviews.author: lovelylily

customer_reviews.title: Get these over Zagg glass
customer_reviews.text: Returned the $40 ZAGG glass for my watch that wouldn’t stick. Kept getting bubbles. I have always used and loved armor suit. So ordered these. Very easy to install. I used it on a Apple Watch 5 44mm. Installed fast. No bubbles. This comes with 6 screen protectors. Lifetime warranty. What’s not to love.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine until I switched bands
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple enough. No bubbles or scratches and curved to the watch corners well. Downside o thought I ordered tempered glass but it's actually a film. Still worked perfectly until I tried to put my watch in a caseband I ordered. Stupid case destroyed both films no matter how carefully I tried to insert watch into it. Otherwise, simple product that worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JhnyBlu

customer_reviews.title: You can reuse the covers indefinitely
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of different screen covers. Don't even get me started on the glass cover that fell off within the first 10 minutes. But Armorsuit is different. It actually protects and lasts far longer than I thought possible. And here's the kicker: You can REUSE and REAPPLY. Have a bubble under the protector? Pull up, hit the face of your watch with the provided liquid and squeegee it back down. The cover holds better than any other one I've tried. And at the price point, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Lough

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen Protector Ever Used !!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best screen protectors ever used. Looks great on the watch face and the instructions are easy to follow. Make sure to follow the instructions carefully for applying the screen protector and be patient with any bubbles that appear under it, they do go away after a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but it was kind of hard for me to get the corners to go on but I’ve never had a screen protector like this. I may have sprayed too much of the liquid on it. However it does really well at protecting the screen of my watch so I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price that helps protect my watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it’s not glass, so it’s more susceptible to scratches than your Apple Watch screen, but it protects your watch from all of that abuse. I have had one screen on for a few months and it has some nice gashes. Even with the abuse my watch still works perfect and the touch screen operates like nothing is there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Olive

customer_reviews.title: Great screen protector!
customer_reviews.text: Got this about a day after I ordered my new Apple watch series 4. I really wanted something light so that I would not have to use a case with it and this did not disappoint! Pretty easy to install, I recommend that everyone watch the installation video before hand and follow all the instructions! Also make sure that you let it dry overnight... I've been using it for about a month now and have had no problems with it whatsoever. Plus you get six of them so if anything happens to one, you have plenty more to install. Cannot recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it, you'll thank me later!
customer_reviews.text: Let's get right off the bat with this product. 1, it is the hardest thing to install on a device imaginable. No matter how many times you watch the video or go into an oxygen/dust free environment, the install is not going to be perfect or what you would expect. 2, the protector lifts consistently you may have that feeling that you did every step right now just leave it over night, and you wake up the edges are raised you place them back down. It works for like 2 seconds. It's just a hard install, and a very low ratio of success on the screen. Really bad product, save your money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac D.

product_meta.title: ArmorSuit [6 Pack] MilitaryShield Screen Protector for Apple Watch Series 4/5 (44mm) [Max Coverage] - Anti-Bubble HD Clear Film
feature_bullets: Made in USA ArmorSuit MilitaryShield precise laser cutting screen protector for Apple Watch Series 5 / Series 4 44mm

Ultra HD Clear and amazingly thin, perfectly matches the contours of your device. Easy application with flexible material is designed for maximum full coverage on curved corners and edges on your device.
Created from scratch-proof, ultra-tough, hd-clear, military-grade, de-colour material and is custom fit for each particular gadget and device with full body and screen protection.
ArmorSuit MilitaryShield has self-repair technology, which helps eliminate minor scratches on the film all by itself. Significantly reduces dust, oil and fingerprint smudges.

Includes: ArmorSuit MilitaryShield screen protector, installation spray, squeegee, microfiber cloth, installation instructions and Manufacturer's Lifetime Replacement Warranty. This Warranty is ONLY valid when purchased directly from an ArmorSuit's official seller on Amazon. ArmorSuit Screen Protector is a flexible thermoplastic urethane film that is built to withstand the curved state it arrives in the package. Made in USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars3,799 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
